tweet: Today marks 50 years since the Stonewall riots. As a proud member of the @LGBTEqCaucus, I am happy to once again join the @NOH8Campaign. #SCOTUS has legally sanctioned partisanship here, which isn’t shocking considering just how partisan this court has become.
